data.text: Yaa ilmaan namootaa, isin hamma yoomiitti ulfina koo gara salphinaatti deebiftu?
Isin akka Waaqayyo warra isaaf bulan ofii isaatiif addaan baafate beekaa;
Namoonni, “Eenyutu waan gaarii nu argi argisiisa?” jedhan baayʼee dha;
Gammachuu isaan yeroo midhaanii fi daadhiin wayinii isaanii baayʼatutti argatan caalaa,
Ani nagaadhaan nan ciisa; nan rafas;
